org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.nodes.intervalfn.IntervalFunction

Packages that use IntervalFunction
Package
Description
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.nodes
Standard Lucene Query Nodes.
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.standard.nodes.intervalfn
This package contains classes that implement interval function support for the standard syntax parser.
